Line21.6D03F: We were the world’s only hope.
Line19.6D03F: Perhaps we weren’t perfect, but we knew we had to make a stand.
Line15.6D03F: Not Sanctuary, but a bid to reign in Hell?
Line13.6D03F: Had that been her goal all along?
Line11.6D03F: One thing was certain, at least: Lilith meant to devour Mephisto and claim his power as her own.
Line17.6D03F: And Elias, the damn fool, was too blind to see it.
Line9.6D03F: They were probably lost and bitter just like us, but Cain had a gift for seeing the good in people.
Line7.6D03F: Bound as one against the encroaching darkness, like the Horadrim of old.
Line5.6D03F: Two old friends reunited. New allies eager to learn from our vast knowledge.
Line1.6D03F: I wonder what old Deckard Cain would have written in his chronicles if he had seen us.
